snippet.title: Storm Warfare Trailer | D-Day | Closed Beta 12 May 2023
snippet.description:
Get ready to dive into the battlefields of World War II with Storm Warfare - the Free-to-Play Web3 Collectible Card Game. Storm Warfare Closed Beta starts on 12 May 2023 and you don't want to miss it! 
Share, like, subscribe!

Join the action and register for Closed Beta now on our website:  
https://www.stormwarfare.com

Inspired by real-life stories, legendary characters, and iconic battles from the Second World War, Storm Warfare brings a fresh perspective to the Collectable Card Game genre. Developed by London-based game company Janus Interactive using Blockchain technology, Storm Warfare's Closed Beta test will begin on Friday 12 May 2023. The Closed Beta, the first phase of the game's 2023 roadmap, will only be available to a privileged group of players with VIP invitations and will last for two weeks. The Closed Beta test will only allow players to use specific modes and features and will provide an opportunity to improve the game based on player feedback. Storm Warfare is scheduled to be released officially within the next few months, following the Open Beta test that will be accessible to everyone.

For more information about Janus Interactive:
https://janusinteractive.co.uk/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/stormwarfare/
Facebook: https://facebook.com/stormwarfare
Discord: https://discord.gg/stormwarfare
Telegram: https://t.me/stormwarfareHQ
Twitter: https://twitter.com/stormwarfare
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/StormWarfare
Medium: https://medium.com/@stormwarfare
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/storm_warfare

#gamers #games #gaming #gameplay #youtubegamer #youtubegaming #gamer #web3gaming #stormwarfare #janusinteractive #gamedev
